channel.title: Turf.js on Kunal Sumbly

item.title: Contributing to Turf.js
item.author: kunal.sumbly@gmail.com (Kunal Sumbly)
item.description: Over the winter I was able to spend some free time assisting with the development of the Turf.js project! This was a very rewarding experience that has allowed me to better grasp some very important topics: Test Driven Development Test driven development is one of the most powerful concepts I picked up while working with Turf. Turf uses the Tape testing environment, and just like turf, focuses on being lightweight and fast.
